00010 #if !defined(MATRIX_H)
00011 #define MATRIX_H
00012 
00013 #include <sstream>
00014 #include <iomanip>
00015 
00016 #include "Vector.H"
00017 
00018 namespace VecMath {
00023     template <unsigned D, typename N = double> class Matrix {
00024         public:
00025             Matrix<D, N> ();
00026             Matrix<D, N> (N, N, N, N, N, N);
00027             Matrix<D, N> (unsigned, unsigned, N);
00028             virtual ~Matrix<D, N> () { }
00029 
00030             N &operator () (unsigned i, unsigned j) {
00031                 return M[i][j];
00032             }
00033 
00034             Matrix<D, N> operator * (const Matrix<D, N> &) const;
00035             Vector<D, N> operator * (const Vector<D, N> &);
00036 
00037             Matrix<D, N> operator - ();
00038 
00039             std::string Print ();
00040 
00041         protected:
00042             N M[D][D];
00043     };
00044 
00045 
00047     template<unsigned D, typename N> Matrix<D, N>::Matrix () {
00048         for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++) {                                      //      i: row
00049             for (unsigned j = 0; j < D; j++)                            //      j: col
00050                 M[i][j] = 0;
00051             M[i][i] = 1;
00052         }
00053     }
00054 
00062     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00063             Matrix<D, N>::Matrix (N Rxy, N Rxz, N Rxw, N Ryz, N Ryw, N Rzw) {
00064         std::cerr << "Matrix<" << D <<">::Matrix<" << D
00065                   <<"> (Rxy, Rxz, Rxw, Ryz, Ryw, Rzw) not yet implemented!"
00066                   << std::endl;
00067         abort();
00068     }
00069 
00074     template<unsigned D, typename N>
00075             Matrix<D, N>::Matrix (unsigned ii, unsigned jj, N Theta) {
00076         N c = cos (Theta*pi/180.), s = sin (Theta*pi/180.);
00077         for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++) {                                      //      i: row
00078             for (unsigned j = 0; j < D; j++)                            //      j: col
00079                 M[i][j] = 0;
00080             M[i][i] = 1;
00081         }
00082         M[ii][ii] =  M[jj][jj] = c;
00083         M[ii][jj] = -s;
00084         M[jj][ii] = s;
00085     }
00086 
00090     template <unsigned D, typename N> Matrix<D, N>
00091             Matrix<D, N>::operator * (const Matrix<D, N> &B) const {
00092         Matrix<D, N> C;
00093         for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++)                                        //      i: row
00094             for (unsigned j = 0; j < D; j++) {                          //      j: col
00095                 N s = 0;
00096                 for (unsigned k = 0; k < D; k++)
00097                     s += M[i][k]*B.M[k][j];
00098                 C.M[i][j] = s;
00099             }
00100         return C;
00101     }
00102 
00106     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00107             Vector<D, N> Matrix<D, N>::operator * (const Vector<D, N> &V) {
00108         Vector<D, N> W;
00109         for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++) {                              //      i: row
00110             N s = 0;
00111             for (unsigned j = 0; j < D; j++)                    //      j: col
00112                 s += M[i][j]*V[j];
00113             W[i] = s;
00114         }
00115         return W;
00116     }
00117 
00120     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00121             Matrix<D, N> Matrix<D, N>::operator - () {
00122         Matrix<D, N> B (*this);
00123         for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++)                                        //      i: row
00124             for (unsigned j = 0; j < D; j++) {                          //      j: col
00125                 B.M[i][j] = -M[i][j];
00126             }
00127         return B;
00128     }
00129 
00130 
00132     template <unsigned D, typename N> std::string Matrix<D, N>::Print () {
00133         std::ostringstream o;
00134         for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++) {
00135             o << "|";
00136             for (unsigned j = 0; j < D; j++)
00137                 o << std::setw (10) << std::setprecision (3) << M[i][j];
00138             o << "|\n";
00139         }
00140         o << std::ends;
00141         return o.str ();
00142     }
00143 
00144 }       // namespace VecMath
